name: Memories of the 'Twilight Zone' Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: The woman who fought off a UFO in a 'silent' episode was ...?
questions.explanation:
Agnes Moorehead.

	The other women were in other episodes.

questions.text: This man steps off a moving train in an attempt to go to a peaceful, idyllic town known as Willoughby.
questions.explanation:
James Daly.

	Again, the other people were in other episodes of the show.

questions.text: The book, 'to serve man' is a ...?
The man who returns to his home town and encounters himself as a young boy is ...?
questions.explanation:
Gig Young.

	The others were in other episodes.

questions.text: Barbara Nichols has a recurring dream while in a hospital: she gets out of bed and goes to a room that turns out to be ...?
Jack Klugman portrayed all of these EXCEPT ...?
questions.explanation:
A soldier.

	A pool player against Jonathan Winters, a father (of 'Pip'), and a musician who meets Gabriel.

questions.text: The man who re-lives a WW II experience by 'dreaming' about being stranded in a desert was ...?
questions.explanation:
Robert Cummings.

	The others weere in other episodes.

questions.text: Two returning astronauts were played by ...?
questions.explanation:
Jim Hutton and Rod Taylor.

	Also one of the better ones.

questions.text: The same actor who went back in time to try to prevent the assassination of Lincoln also played a scientist who experienced time travel in a different episode in a different manner.
questions.explanation:
Russell Johnson.

	Again, a professor. Tthe others were in other episodes

questions.text: A woman who returns to her past as an actress is ...?
questions.explanation:
Ida Lupino.

	The others were in other episodes.
